====================================

### Quantitative Mineralogy Services

#### Project Details

* **Project Title: **Quantitative Mineralogy Services
* **Reference Number:** PW-22-01004877
* **Amendment Number:** 2
* **Solicitation Number:** NRCan-5000067929
* **Publication Date:** August 19, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date:** September 28, 2022 at 14:00:00
* **Amendment Date:** September 23, 2022

#### Description

This solicitation is for the provision of quantitative mineralogy services, specifically the characterization of ore and processing products, to support ongoing research studies at CanmetMINING (Natural Resources Canada). The scope of work includes:

* Quantitative mineralogy characterization of ore and processing products to support ongoing research studies at CanmetMINING

#### Important Details

* **Trade Agreements:** This tender is open to contractors who have registered for the following free trade agreements: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement.
* **Regions of Opportunity:** This tender is open to contractors who can provide services throughout Canada.
* **Regions of Delivery:** The service will be provided in the National Capital Region (NCR).
* **Contracting Entity:** Natural Resources Canada
* **Contact Information:**
	+ Name: Brenda Harlow
	+ Email: [brenda.harlow@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca](mailto:brenda.harlow@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca)
